entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
